title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open
OB:
When I follow the steps in 1GEWMOZ to reproduce the issue:
1. Create a new basic project
2. Create a new file named test.xml
3. The default editor used for test.xml is the scripted resource editor example, which ignores the XML file content
4. In the Navigator, select test.xml
5. Choose 'Open With...' option
6. Select 'Default Text Editor'

The expected behavior is that a new editor should open for the file, since the editor type is different

However, the observed behavior is that nothing happens when I select 'Default Text Editor'. Instead, it reactivates the scripted resource editor example

Additionally, when searching for an existing open file, the search should also consider the editor types
